project_descr: Environmental sustainability considerations and MDGs integrated into planning

outputs.output_descr: National strategies, policies and action plans which integrate the environmental provisions of the MGDS that are implemented, in meaningful partnerships with civil society and with effective coordination of development partners.

outputs.output_descr: Facilitate and establish business-led, enterprise solutions to poverty reduction
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: The overall illiteracy rate is staggers around 37%, and disaggregated in terms of gender, more women (about 50%) than men (30%) are illiterate. These rates are much lower than those of other countries in Sub-Saharan Africa. Literacy rates for South Africa, Zimbabwe and Kenya are estimated to be at over 80%. It is within this context of extreme vulnerability to diseases and external shocks that the efforts to improve human capital development in Malawi are being seen as critical in reversing the scourges of poverty and exclusion. To its credit, the Government of Malawi with support from UNDP embraced integrated functional literacy and REFLECT in particular, as a participatory methodology which can address both adult illiteracy and livelihood insecurity.
donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
